languages.text: {n}Маражай скалится Винтерскейлу в ответ.{/n} "Какой интригующий мон-кай... я бы проверил, насколько его дерзость соответствует способностям!"
{n}Marazhai smiles at Winterscale in return.{/n} "What an intriguing mon-keigh... I would test whether his ability matches his audacity."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай скалится Винтерскейлу в ответ.{/n} "Какой интригующий мон-кай... я бы проверил, насколько его дерзость соответствует способностям!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai grins at Winterscale in return.{/n} "What an intriguing mon-keigh... I would test whether his ability matches his audacity."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai responde a Winterscale con una sonrisa.{/n} «Este mon-keigh me intriga... Me gustaría comprobar si su destreza está a la altura de su osadía».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smiles at Winterscale in return.{/n} "What an intriguing mon-keigh... I would test whether his ability matches his audacity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai responde a Winterscale con una sonrisa burlona.{/n} «Este mon-keigh me intriga... Me gustaría comprobar si su destreza está a la altura de su osadía».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋也对温特斯凯尔露出了微笑。{/n}“真是只有趣的猴子……我想试试，他的能耐到底能不能配得上他的傲慢。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smiles at Winterscale in return.{/n} "What an intriguing mon-keigh... I would test whether his ability matches his audacity."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋也朝温特斯凯尔咧嘴一笑。{/n}“真是只有趣的猴子……我想试试，他的能耐到底能不能配得上他的傲慢。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai renvoie son sourire à Winterscale.{/n} « Voilà un mon-keigh intéressant... J'aimerais bien voir s'il est aussi habile qu'audacieux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smiles at Winterscale in return.{/n} "What an intriguing mon-keigh... I would test whether his ability matches his audacity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai renvoie son sourire à Winterscale.{/n} « Voilà un mon-keigh intéressant... J'aimerais bien voir s'il est aussi habile qu'audacieux. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはウィンタースケールに笑みを返す。{/n}「なんて魅力的なモン＝ケイだ…ヤツの力がその豪胆さに見合っているかどうか、確かめたい」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smiles at Winterscale in return.{/n} "What an intriguing mon-keigh... I would test whether his ability matches his audacity."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはウィンタースケールに笑みを返す。{/n}「なんて魅力的なモン＝ケイだ…ヤツの力がその豪胆さに見合っているかどうか、確かめたい」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai grinst Winterzunder an.{/n} "Welch faszinierender Chem-Pan-Sey ... Ich würde gerne prüfen, ob sein Können seiner Verwegenheit entspricht."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smiles at Winterscale in return.{/n} "What an intriguing mon-keigh... I would test whether his ability matches his audacity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai grinst Winterzunder an.{/n} "Welch faszinierender Chem-Pan-Sey ... Ich würde gerne prüfen, ob sein Können seiner Verwegenheit entspricht."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, karşılık olarak Winterscale'e gülümsüyor.{/n} "Ne kadar ilginç bir mon-keigh... Kabiliyetlerinin küstahlığıyla eşleşip eşleşmeyeceğini teste tabi tutmak isterdim."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smiles at Winterscale in return.{/n} "What an intriguing mon-keigh... I would test whether his ability matches his audacity."
